description: Its impossible to aim properly in this game because theres no guide line to show you where on the ball youre going to hit. if you can find foobilliard install that instead

It'd be cool if it showed the pool stick and, inverted the arrow keys (not just the mouse), allowed you to change the arrow keys to wsda or another combination. It'd also be really cool if it didn't skip the animation after hitting shooting. Sometimes, not all the time, it skips the animation. I think it's a bug, or it is detecting a some flutter when spacebar is pressed.
summary: It's okay, but not user friendly

description: Me encanta, pero me gustaría que añadieran el taco para hacerlo más intuitivo. Gracias a los desarrolladores.
